tool_description: Football (soccer) xG statistics. We provide statistics for more than 80 leagues. There are more than 90 000 games and 2 million shots  in our database.
title: Football xG Statistics

api_list.name: Tournaments List By CountryId
api_list.description: The method is used to get a list of leagues (divisions) by the country id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-xg-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{id}/tournaments/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-xg-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Odds For Upcoming Fixtures
api_list.description:
